p: The measured t 8/5-times in the 1st weld bead of approximately 2 s show small deviations between the experimental trials with adjusted CTWD. According to the CCT-diagram, the formation of a martensitic-bainitic microstructure with high hardness values > 257 HV appeared for t 8/5-times up to 4 s. These cooling conditions were measured from the first to the third layer (compare Figure 12). With increasing structure height and thus longer t 8/5-times, the microstructure consisted of varying proportions of bainite and ferrite (compare Figure 13). The expectable hardness decreased.
